alert.note: Alert for Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest; Simcoe Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 11 at 3:43AM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 7 inches possible. * WHERE...Simcoe Highlands and Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest. * WHEN...From late Friday night through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest; Simcoe Highlands
